Hiss/Punch/Breakdown/Pyro:




Hiss cursed, blasts tailing him.  Diving behind a tree, he felt it shake as 
the energon bullet pierced into it.  Turning around from the tree, he fired 
off three fusion blasts, running and jumping, transforming in mid air.  
"Catch me, Breakdown!"

Breakdown stood up, catching Hiss, the ex-snake (do to alternate mode 
changes) in his ray gun mode, small enough for Breakdown to catch with one 
hand.

Punch ducked, a tree being curt in half, flipping back, a blast skinning his 
knee.  The forest was burning fast.  Firing off three blasts from his plasma 
cannon at Archangel, he dived behind a tree, going to his kangaroo mode, 
hopping away.

Breakdown fired a grenade off at Steel, three powerful laser blasts from Hiss 
in ray gun mode at Ripper's left knee, running deeper into the woods.

Pyro grunted, blasts digging into his armor.  "Eat flames, punk!" the 
Oblitercon yelled, firing off three fireballs at Steel's abdomen, going 
reverse at 40 MPH, smashing through charred and dead trees.
